messages.original: Around 12 Geran-2 drones over Kyiv right now. More are flying in. Ukrainian AA fire is working on them.
2 Kh-101s are flying towards Starokostyantyniv Airbase. 20 km away.
The Kh-101s are ~10km away from Starokostyantyniv Airbase
Explosions in Starokostyantyniv. 2 impacts to the Airbase.
Only around 4 missiles left in Ukrainian airspace. They are scattered in different regions.
The missile in Chernihiv Oblast has changed course to Kyiv again. It is flying in from the east.
The missile in Chernihiv Oblast has changed course to Kyiv again. It is flying in from the east.
30 km from Kyiv. Flying in from the southeast.
The 1-2 missiles in Kirovohrad Oblast turned south to Mykolaiv Oblast again.
The two missiles from Mykolaiv Oblast are flying northwest through Vinnytsia Oblast.
30 km from Kyiv. Flying in from the southeast.
Shot down on approach to Boryspil, Kyiv Oblast. 1 missile from Cherkasy Oblast is approaching Bila Tserkva, Kyiv Oblast.
The two missiles from Mykolaiv Oblast are flying northwest through Vinnytsia Oblast.
The 2 missiles in Vinnytsia Oblast are now flying to Bila Tserkva, Kyiv Oblast.
3+ missiles to Bila Tserkva from the southwest.
3+ missiles to Bila Tserkva from the southwest.
3+ missiles to Bila Tserkva from the southwest.
The remaining 2 missiles in Kyiv Oblast are flying north towards the city of Makariv, west of Kyiv.
The remaining 2 missiles in Kyiv Oblast are flying north towards the city of Makariv, west of Kyiv.
They have flown to northeastern Zhytomyr Oblast
Still ~95 Geran-2 drones left in Ukrainian airspace. They are mostly flying in a massive chain towards Kyiv.
Still ~95 Geran-2 drones left in Ukrainian airspace. They are mostly flying in a massive chain towards Kyiv.
The last 1-2 Kh-101 missiles are maneuvering in northwestern Kyiv Oblast.
The last 1-2 Kh-101 missiles are maneuvering in northwestern Kyiv Oblast.
Disappeared in the area of Makariv, Kyiv Oblast.

In today's large-scale combined missile attack on Ukraine, approximately 40 cruise missiles (34 Kh-101s and 6 Kalibrs), 2 Iskander-M ballistic missiles, and 2 Kinzhal hypersonic aeroballistic missiles were used (total of ~44 missiles).
Due to the complexity of the attack and conflicting information on movements, it is impossible to get an accurate number on interceptions. However, I can confirm that at least 8 Kh-101s and 2 Kalibrs were shot down by Ukrainian air defence, namely Patriot systems which were more active than usual. Keep in mind, interception rates are likely higher. 
In addition to the missiles, hundreds of Geran-2, Geran-3, and Gerbera drones were launched, and as of the time of writing there are still approximately 90 still detected in Ukrainian airspace, flying to attack Kyiv Oblast. 
The main targets for this attack were:
Kyiv City, Kyiv Oblast
Bila Tserkva, Kyiv Oblast
Bohuslav, Kyiv Oblast
Vasylkiv, Kyiv Oblast
Irpin, Kyiv Oblast
Bilhorod-Dnistrovskyi, Odesa Oblast
Starokostyantyniv, Khmelnytskyi Oblast
Konotop, Sumy Oblast
Zaporizhzhia City, Zaporizhzhia Oblast
